name: Gray-Scale: Bronk's battle
description:
The second fight in the Gray-Scale series. this fight revolves around keeping you in the air.

First fight: https://beeeans.itch.io/gray-scaled

Tip: there is a counter in the top right with the numerical value of the boss's next attack if you can memorize the number associated with an attack you might be able to react quicker.

controls:

WASD - A and D control left and right, W is jump, and S is to fast fall.

Arrow keys - you can attack right, left and up, not downwards.

Bugs:

if it doesn't let you move reload the page.
